factory_open.name: Industrial Hub
factory_open.quote: An immeasurable amount of companies of all types regroup in this hotbed of activity.

factory_orbital.name: Refining Ducts
factory_orbital.quote: Gaping trenches that dump resources from extraction to processing sites.

finance_open.name: Reflect District
finance_open.quote: A financial hub, the lungs of stelloliberalism.

hab_dome.name: Capsule Cities
hab_dome.quote: A mosaic of pavilions connected by glass walkways.

hab_open.name: Residential District
hab_open.quote: A quiet housing complex for megapolis workers.

hab_open_rich.name: Residential Archipelago
hab_open_rich.quote: A peaceful haven for a privileged few.

happy_orbital.name: O.P.U.
happy_orbital.quote: In the vacuum of space, the chances of escape are almost null.

happy_pot_open.name: Preserved Ecosystem
happy_pot_open.quote: An oasis of hope to tell ourselves that not everything is destined to become steel and concrete.

happy_pot_orbital.name: Zero-G Arena
happy_pot_orbital.quote: Brawling is even more fun in zero gravity.

high_factory_dome.name: Metamaterials Factory
high_factory_dome.quote: Where first-rate scientists design artificial composite materials for the high-tech industry.

ideo_credit_open.name: Network of Artificial Islands
ideo_credit_open.quote: A nice place to relax and make some lucrative deals while we're at it.

ideo_open.name: Citadel
ideo_open.quote: Symbol of might and resolute authority, its mere presence is enough to convince us that we are on the right side.

infra_dome.name: Central Hub
infra_dome.quote: Humanity's beating heart in a barren environment.

infra_open.name: Megapolis
infra_open.quote: A city-world, bridge between heaven and earth.

market_dome.name: Omnimarket
market_dome.quote: From hyperdrive motors to decorative holograms, it's all here.

market_open.name: Commercial Artery
market_open.quote: A veritable river of goods and capital.

mine_dome.name: Array of Excavators
mine_dome.quote: Enormous and indestructible mechanical ploughs that rip up the earth's crust to extract metals.

mine_orbital.name: Swarm of Self-drilling Machines
mine_orbital.quote: They pierce the surface with a deafening roar.

monument_dome.name: Monolith
monument_dome.quote: Sculpted planet or chiseled asteroid, it's absolutely grandiose.

monument_open.name: Floating Gardens
monument_open.quote: A dreamlike place where spirits are calm and ideas are exchanged.

research_orbital.name: Experiment Station
research_orbital.quote: For some, the pride of humanity. For others, its downfall.

university_open.name: Delta Polytech
university_open.quote: Confluence of knowledge, convergence of intelligence, influx of innovation.

skills.description: Increases the production of the star system.
skills.name: Production

skills.description: Increases the defense of the star system.
skills.name: Defense

skills.description: Increases the experience of ships on the star system.
skills.name: Training

skills.description: Increases the chances of taking control of a dominion.
skills.name: Propaganda

skills.description: Increases the impact on the stability of the targeted system.
skills.name: Destabilization

skills.description: Increases the chance of turning an enemy agent.
skills.name: Seduction

skills.description: Increases the stability of the star system.
skills.name: Cohesion

skills.description: Increases the production of technology in the star system.
skills.name: Knowledge

skills.description: Increases the production of ideology in the star system.
skills.name: Wisdom

skills.description: Increases the chances of infiltration (gain of visibility level).
skills.name: Infiltration

skills.description: Increases the chances of a successful assassination.
skills.name: Removal

skills.description: Increases the chances of successful sabotage.
skills.name: Sabotage

skills.description: Increases the production of credits in the star system.
skills.name: Finance

admiral_1.name: Reaction Force
admiral_1.quote: If you want peace, prepare for war.

admiral_3.name: Military Academy
admiral_3.quote: Whether attacking or defending, fight at all costs!

admiral_4.name: War Propaganda
admiral_4.quote: Spread terror and convert the rebels.

credit_1.name: Stelloliberal Maze
credit_1.quote: Plant the seed and watch it grow.

credit_3.name: Embezzlement
credit_3.quote: When traditional means no longer suffice.

dominion_1.description: Increases the number of dominions you can subdue by 3.
dominion_1.name: Exclusive Trade Zone

dominion_2.description: Increases the number of dominions you can subdue by 4.
dominion_2.name: Protectorate

dominion_3.description: Increases the number of dominions you can subdue by 7.
dominion_3.name: Federation of Protectorates

ideo_1.name: Linguistic Unification
ideo_1.quote: There is only one noble language.

ideo_3.name: Stelloliberalized Entertainment
ideo_3.quote: If you repeat it enough, they will end up believing it!

ideo_pola.name: Fake News
ideo_pola.quote: Shape facts to suit your needs.

speaker_2.name: Public Relations
speaker_2.quote: Invite people to join your culture.

spy_2.name: Secret Organization
spy_2.quote: The enemy won't see it coming.

spy_4.name: Parallel Military Strategy
spy_4.quote: Master information before taking up arms.

sys_dom_1.description: Increases the number of systems you can administer by 1 and the number of dominions you can subdue by 2.
sys_dom_1.name: External Colonies
sys_dom_1.quote: Establish your presence in the four corners of the galaxy.

sys_dom_2.description: Increases the number of systems you can administer by 2 and the number of dominions you can subdue by 4.
sys_dom_2.name: Empire's Edge

system_1.description: Increase the number of systems you can administer by 1.
system_1.name: Proto-Empire

system_2.description: Increases the number of systems you can administer by 1.
system_2.name: Extended Administration

system_3.description: Increases the number of systems you can administer by 2.
system_3.name: Decentralized Administration
system_3.quote: More systems under your aegis for more power.

system_4.description: Increases the number of systems you can manage by 3.
system_4.name: Second Core
system_4.quote: Expand your empire and subdue the weak peoples.

tech_2.name: Sponsored Chairmanship
tech_2.quote: Scientific influence is reached though exemplary education.

tech_3.name: Predictive Sciences
tech_3.quote: Let's hope this doesn't blow up in your face.

ark.description: Azkos Technologies, Ravecroft, Kovaka. Such is the triad of the galaxy's most powerful companies. Involved in the aerospace, entertainment and terraforming industries, respectively, these sprawling companies have come together to form a superstructure that sits at the same negotiating table as the most powerful states in the galaxy. Capable of arming a veritable war fleet, A.R.K. no longer hides its ambition to exist outside the Tetrarchy and in a world in which its billions of employees will serve as Arkian citizens. Commercially connected to an enormous number of systems, its aspiration for independence is a major problem for all factions.
ark.name: A.R.K.

cardan.description: Cardan is a powerful nation that has existed since the dawn of time. It is a very hierarchical and traditional society in which every gesture is codified by the tenets of the Siderian Order. These laws, which structure Cardanian life in a religious manner, insist on the superiority of man over machine. Myrmezirian abolitionism is thus perceived as an abomination that must be fought at all costs to avoid the apocalypse. This aversion to robots does not make of Cardan a technophobic faction, however. Their battle cruisers are fully operational and their fanatical army has every intention of imposing its worldview on the entire galaxy.
cardan.name: Cardan

myrmezir.description: The Tetrarchate of Tetran is now commonly called "Myrmezir", the planet of origin of a popular and revolutionary Tetrarch. This new name comes from the emancipatory will that Myrmezirians have towards the Tetrarchy. This separatism was initially symptomatic of a strong desire for democracy, but today it includes the aspiration to end machine slavery and have them become full-fledged citizens. Due to its rupture with autocracy and its dynamic ideas, Myrmezir is seen by the galaxy's oppressed masses as a beacon of hope and is generally well-regarded by the working-class. Its dignitaries are listened to and venerated but are often the targets of the Erased, assassins hired to suppress them.
myrmezir.name: Myrmezir

synelle.description: The Syns live in remote areas of the Galaxy, often referred to as the Fringes. They have formed a federation of generally peaceful nations that has always been able to solve its problems through consensus. The many traditions that govern relations among the Syns give this faction a unity that has enabled them to remain strong and proud in the face of external threats. Diametrically opposed to A.R.K.'s world view, which gains ever more influence in Syn territories, the Syns have elected a few strong men, providential heroes, who will restore balance and enable the wise Syn people to maintain their integrity and continue their peaceful existence.
synelle.name: Synelectic Federation

tetrarchy.description: A declining superpower is still a superpower and only a fool would underestimate the Tetrarchy, a faction whose hegemony is merely in dispute for the moment. Historically composed of four capital planets and ruled by four Tetrarchs, the Tetrarchy must not only face up to Myrmezir's sedition, but also other factions' manoeuvrings. To do so, it can count on highly experienced Navarchs, notably Arledge Galtacon, as well as a powerful fleet that remains unparalleled in the galaxy. The Tetrarchy itself is undoubtedly its own worst enemy. This vast heterogeneous ensemble is ripe prey for separatism. Only agressive propaganda and deeply rooted traditions can preserve the unity of this supernation.
tetrarchy.name: Tetrarchy

patent_info.infra_dome_2: Allows for buildings on barren planets to be upgraded to level 2
patent_info.infra_dome_3: Allows for buildings on barren planets to be upgraded to level 3
patent_info.infra_dome_4: Allows for buildings on barren planets to be upgraded to level 4
patent_info.infra_dome_5: Allows for buildings on barren planets to be upgraded to level 5
patent_info.infra_open_2: Allows for buildings on habitable planets to be upgraded to level 2
patent_info.infra_open_3: Allows for buildings on habitable planets to be upgraded to level 3
patent_info.infra_open_4: Allows for buildings on habitable planets to be upgraded to level 4
patent_info.infra_open_5: Allows for buildings on habitable planets to be upgraded to level 5
patent_info.infra_orbital_2: Allows for orbital buildings to be upgraded to level 2
patent_info.infra_orbital_3: Allows for orbital buildings to be upgraded to level 3
patent_info.infra_orbital_4: Allows for orbital buildings to be upgraded to level 4
patent_info.infra_orbital_5: Allows for orbital buildings to be upgraded to level 5
patent_info.merge_corvette_1: Allows for construction or merging of units of 4 Corvettes
patent_info.merge_corvette_2: Allows for construction or merging of units of 8 Corvettes
patent_info.merge_fighter_1: Allows for construction or merging of units of 4 Fighters
patent_info.merge_fighter_2: Allows for construction or merging of units of 8 Fighters
patent_info.merge_fighter_3: Allows for construction or merging of units of 16 Fighters
patent_info.merge_fighter_corvette: Allows for construction or merging of units of 8 Fighters. Allows for construction or merging of units of 4 Corvettes
patent_info.merge_frigate_1: Allows for construction or merging of units of 4 Frigates

demonstration.desc: Large protests take place in front of symbols of authority.
demonstration.name: Protests

general_uprising.desc: The system is in a state of widespread rebellion.
general_uprising.name: Widespread rebellion

uprising.desc: Localized revolts spark in production centers.
uprising.name: Localized revolts

fighter_2v4.description: Incredibly swift, these ships dodge most shots and are hard to take out.
fighter_2v4.name: 16 Light Fighters

ark_early.description: A.R.K., the massive consortium it is, has access to almost unlimited funds.
ark_early.name: Multisidereal Consortium

ark_late.description: When it comes to doing business, having access to the best luxury ships is imperative.
ark_late.name: Aeronautical Tycoon

ark_malus.description: A.R.K. uses a lot of mercenaries, and they are expensive.
ark_malus.name: Mercenary

cardan_early.description: The Nekesh Foundation, murky and mysterious, is nonetheless known for its excellent Erased.
cardan_early.name: Nekesh Circle

cardan_late.description: Siderian's doctrine has spread throughout the galaxy and many, though not openly vocal about it, support Cardan's ideas.
cardan_late.name: Network of Believers

cardan_malus.description: Siderian teaches to handle technology with caution.
cardan_malus.name: Technology Caution

cardan_mid.description: Cardan has been practicing RNA selection of Shadow abilities since the dawn of time.
cardan_mid.name: RNA Selection

myrmezir_early.description: The revolutionary rhetoric of the Myrmezirian emissaries echoes throughout the galaxy; numerous are the allies of the cause.
myrmezir_early.name: Revolutionary Inspiration

myrmezir_late.description: The Ariance Charter regulates the administration of protectorates.
myrmezir_late.name: The Ariance Charter

myrmezir_malus.description: Cultural diversity brings many benefits, but tensions are always present.
myrmezir_malus.name: Cultural diversity

myrmezir_mid.description: The founding texts of the Siderians' doctrine are still very much studied.
myrmezir_mid.name: Siderean Teachings

synelle_early.description: The Syns settled the Fringes; they are used to uncharted territories where everything remains to be done.
synelle_early.name: Salt of the Earth

synelle_late.description: The soldier-mechanics of the Syns' grey militia pride themselves on their ability to fly any ship.
synelle_late.name: Grey Militia

synelle_malus.description: The significant decentralization of Syns fiefdoms results in a net loss to the IRS.
synelle_malus.name: Decentralization

synelle_mid.description: Syns live close to the land, and will defend it at all costs.
synelle_mid.name: Syns strength

tetrarchy_early.description: The famous Aphera Research Centers established on Quadrinople have always been at the cutting edge of technology.
tetrarchy_early.name: Aphera Research Centers

tetrarchy_late.description: The Chatur Arsenal, a Tetrarchy stronghold, is a formidable stockpile of weapons and spare parts.
tetrarchy_late.name: Chatur Arsenal

tetrarchy_malus.description: The great imperial houses refuse all social advances, even the smallest ones.
tetrarchy_malus.name: Old Houses

tetrarchy_mid.description: Akhena has conquered the galaxy with its versatile and well-trained frigates.
tetrarchy_mid.name: Heart of the fleet

conquest.description: A Path of Conquest victory requires that your faction controls a large amount of sectors. Each sector is worth a certain number of points (visible when fully zoomed out on the map). To claim a sector your faction must possess a majority of the star systems within said sector.
conquest.name: Path of **Conquest**

population.description: A Path of Influence victory requires that your faction have the most populous empire. To progress along this path it is necessary that the sum of your faction's star system and dominion points passes a certain threshold.
population.name: Path of **Influence**

visibility.description: A Path of Shadows victory requires that your faction have lots of visibility over your adversaries. To progress along this path it is necessary to infiltrate the networks on most of your adversaries' star systems. This path is hidden and you will not be able to see your adversaries' advancement along it nor will they be able to see yours; take them by surprise!
visibility.name: Path of **Shadows**
